data.comment: The match is underway in Yokohama.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 1, Hiroyuki Kimura awards Yokohama Marinos a goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Tosu in Yokohama.
Tosu drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 4, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tosu in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 6, Yokohama Marinos push upfield and Thiago Martins gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Tosu defence.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
Can Yokohama Marinos get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Takeshi Kanamori of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Yokohama Tosu attack through Ayumu Ohata. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
The home team replace Ryo Takano with Yuki Otsu.
Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in Tosu.
Tosu's Cho Dong-geon gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
In the minute 14, Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Tosu at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 15, Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Yokohama Marinos's Daizen Maeda misses with an attempt on goal.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Tosu a goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos drives forward and Junior Santos gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 22, In Yokohama Yokohama Marinos drive forward through Junior Santos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Yokohama Marinos throw-in in Tosu's half.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 28, Tosu are pushing forward but Cho Dong-geon's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
Throw-in for Tosu in the half of Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama Marinos goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Tosu!
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 31, Kaisei Ishii (Tosu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tosu.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Tosu.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
In the minute 43, Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Tosu.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Tosu have a goal kick.
At Nissan Stadium the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Yokohama Marinos's Kota Mizunuma breaks free at Nissan Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hiroyuki Kimura awards Tosu a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Ange Postecoglou (Yokohama Marinos) is making a second substitution, with Erik replacing Eitaro Matsuda.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Tosu.
Goal! Ryoya Morishita gives Tosu a 0-1 lead.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 51, Kaisei Ishii gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tosu.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Tosu throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
In the minute 54, Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Tosu.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 57, Myung Hwi Kim is making the team's first substitution at Nissan Stadium with Tomoya Koyamatsu replacing Takeshi Kanamori.
Yokohama Marinos awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 59, Tosu have a goal kick.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Yokohama Marinos territory.
Goal kick for Yokohama Marinos at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Junior Santos (Yokohama Marinos) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Yokohama Marinos have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team have replaced Cho Dong-geon with Daichi Hayashi. This is the third substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
In the minute 64, Fuchi Honda is replacing Ryang Yong-Gi for Tosu at Nissan Stadium.
Yokohama Marinos push forward at Nissan Stadium and Erik gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Tosu defence.
In the minute 67, Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Yokohama Marinos drive forward but Junior Santos is judged offside.
Yokohama Marinos make their fourth substitution with Edigar Junio replacing Daizen Maeda.
In the minute 69, Marcos Junior is on a sub for Takuya Wada for Yokohama Marinos.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Tosu.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos close to the penalty box.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 75, Marcos Junior (Yokohama Marinos) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Tosu at Nissan Stadium.
In the minute 75, Myung Hwi Kim (Tosu) is making a fourth substitution, with Yuto Uchida replacing Kaisei Ishii.
The away team have replaced Ryoya Morishita with Yuzo Kobayashi. This is the fifth substitution made today by Myung Hwi Kim.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a free kick to Yokohama Marinos in their own half.
In the minute 79, Important block from the Tosu defence as Erik fires in a strike for Yokohama Marinos.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Yokohama Marinos have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
In the minute 80, In Yokohama, Yuki Otsu of Yokohama Marinos is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can Tosu get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half?
Ange Postecoglou is making the team's fifth substitution at Nissan Stadium with Jun Amano replacing Junior Santos.
In the minute 84, Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erik levels the score at 1-1.
Jun Amano instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 85, Yokohama Marinos have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
Yokohama Marinos advance rapidly upfield but Hiroyuki Kimura blows for offside.
In the minute 87, Can Yokohama Marinos capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Yokohama Marinos's Takuya Kida gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tosu defender.
Corner awarded to Yokohama Marinos.
Hiroyuki Kimura signals a Tosu throw-in in Yokohama Marinos's half.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
Tosu have been awarded a corner by Hiroyuki Kimura.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Yokohama Marinos to take a throw-in in Tosu territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Free kick for Yokohama Marinos in the half of Tosu.
That's full-time at Nissan Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
